query:
mutation($userName: String!,
  $name: String!,
                  $seenAt: Date!,
                  $seenAtLat: String!,
                  $seenAtLon: String!,
                  $photo: Upload!) {
  createNewSighting(userName: $userName,
  name:$name,
  seenAt: $seenAt,
  seenAtLat: $seenAtLat,
  seenAtLon: $seenAtLon,
  photo: $photo)
}
